topic: How to containerize edge runtimes using fastapi with Python 3.12+
prompt: Write a Python 3.12+ focused, accurate explainer for: How to containerize edge runtimes using fastapi with Python 3.12+

response_parsed.title: Containerizing Edge Runtimes using FastAPI with Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide demonstrates how to containerize edge runtimes using FastAPI, a modern, high-performance web framework for building APIs with Python 3.12+.
key_points: Understanding the benefits of containerization and its role in edge computing
Setting up development environment for Python 3.12+
Building and optimizing the Docker image
Running the containerized FastAPI application on edge devices
Deploying the container using popular orchestration tools

code_examples.code:
FROM python:3.12
WORKDIR /app
COPY . /app
RUN pip install fastapi uvicorn
CMD ["uvicorn", "main:app", "--host", "0.0.0.0", "--port", "80"]

version_notes: FastAPI version: Latest stable version (as of writing this, v0.75.1)
caveats: Ensure your edge devices meet the minimum system requirements for running Python 3.12+ and FastAPI
Optimize your Docker image by removing unnecessary packages and reducing its size
Configure network settings appropriately to ensure seamless communication between edge devices and other services
